edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl
Class AbstractSynset

java.lang.Object
  edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl.AbstractSynset
All Implemented Interfaces:
Synset
Direct Known Subclasses:
ReferenceSynset
public abstract class AbstractSynset
extends Object
implements Synset

An abstract Synset implementation. This provides encapsulation of some of the basic properties of a synset, specifically a type / part of speech, a definition, and example sentences.

Constructor Summary

          Constructor that accepts the basic synset properties.
